name: Helios
description: Helios is a multi-source addon for wako with the added ability to install custom provider. Helios allows users to connect to multiple online/offline services at once for their viewing with a single click.
author: Davy

changeLogs.1.0.3:
Fix Elementum issue that doesn't open the stream.
Fix missing translations
changeLogs.1.0.1: PM - If query search (manual search), let the user pick the video
